---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

Load the data
```{r}
nba <- read.csv("nba_final.csv")
```

Select only the columns we need
```{r}
nba <- nba[, c("PTS", "AST", "BLK", "MP", "Play", "mean_views")]
```

Clean the row with NA in one of the columns
```{r}
nba <- na.omit(nba)
```

Look at the data
```{r}
head(nba)
```

Fit a preliminary model with 5 predictors: `PTS`, `AST`, `BLK`, `MP`, AND `Play` and response variable `mean_views`
```{r}
prelim_model <- lm(mean_views ~ PTS + AST + BLK + MP + Play, nba)
summary(prelim_model)
```

Residuals vs fitted values plot
```{r}
y_value <- resid(prelim_model)
x_value <- fitted(prelim_model)
plot(x_value, y_value, xlab = "Fitted values", ylab = "Residuals", main = "Residuals vs Fitted values")
```

Residuals vs each predictor (quantitative) plot
```{r}
par(mfrow = c(2, 2))

plot(nba$PTS, y_value, xlab = "Points per game", ylab = "Residuals", main = "Residuals vs Points per game")
plot(nba$AST, y_value, xlab = "Assists per game", ylab = "Residuals", main = "Residuals vs Assists per game")
plot(nba$BLK, y_value, xlab = "Blocks per game", ylab = "Residuals", main = "Residuals vs Blocks per game")
plot(nba$MP, y_value, xlab = "Minutes played", ylab = "Residuals", main = "Residuals vs Minutes played")
```

Residuals vs each predictor (categorical) plot
```{r}
boxplot(y_value ~ nba$Play, xlab = "All-star participation", ylab = "Residuals", main = "Residuals vs All-star participation")
```

Normal QQ plot
```{r}
qqnorm(y_value)
qqline(y_value)
```
